ohloh.description: A Kademlia-based DHT and JSON protocol for application meshing and eventing
ohloh.name: TeleHash

description: [Telehash](http://telehash.org/) a new encrypted P2P JSON-based protocol enabling developers to quickly build apps that are distributed and private (see the [protocol](https://github.com/telehash/telehash.org/blob/master/protocol.md) spec)
name: Telehash
